panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last day, and the annualized % of the daily earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one day old, or that you started prometheus at least one day ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Daily earning

alert.message: ETH One of the two process just restarted.
alert.name: ETH WARN NODE/VALIDATOR: The process just restarted

panels.description:
This alert is useful only for people who has automatic restart of the process after crash. 
This can be made for example by using the prysm.bat file on windows with "set PRYSM_AUTORESTART=true&", or with docker with "--restart always"
panels.title: ETH Warn: The process just restarted

alert.message: ETH NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 SLOTS BEHIND THAN THE CHAIN
alert.name: ETH NODE: 50 slots behind

alert.message: ETH NODE/VALIDATOR: THE NODE OR VALIDATOR IS DOWN FOR MORE THAN 1 MINUTE
alert.name: ETH NODE/VALIDATOR: Process Down

alert.message: ETH NETWORK ALERT: THE PARTICIPATION RATE IS BELOW 66%! You won't get any reward until the participation rate rise up above 66% again. This alert doesn't require any action from you
alert.name: ETH NETWORK: Participation rate below 66%
